sqlMap.select:
select id, app_id, store_id, user_id, order_item_id, s_end_username, d_order_date, s_order_status, s_payment_status, f_amount, f_payment_fee, txn_id, payer_id, receipt_id, s_payer_status, d_payment_date, s_payment_remarks, s_app_name, s_app_territories, s_app_icon_image, s_app_loader_image, b_app_submission_to_apple from orders
order by $orderByClause$

select id, app_id, store_id, user_id, order_item_id, s_end_username, d_order_date, s_order_status, s_payment_status, f_amount, f_payment_fee, txn_id, payer_id, receipt_id, s_payer_status, d_payment_date, s_payment_remarks, s_app_name, s_app_territories, s_app_icon_image, s_app_loader_image, b_app_submission_to_apple from orders where id = #id:BIGINT#

select id, app_id, store_id, user_id, order_item_id, s_end_username, d_order_date, s_order_status, s_payment_status, f_amount, f_payment_fee, txn_id, payer_id, receipt_id, s_payer_status, d_payment_date, s_payment_remarks, s_app_name, s_app_territories, s_app_icon_image, s_app_loader_image, b_app_submission_to_apple from orders where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into orders (id, app_id, store_id, user_id, order_item_id, s_end_username, d_order_date, s_order_status, s_payment_status, f_amount, f_payment_fee, txn_id, payer_id, receipt_id, s_payer_status, d_payment_date, s_payment_remarks, s_app_name, s_app_territories, s_app_icon_image, s_app_loader_image, b_app_submission_to_apple) values (#id:BIGINT#, #appId:BIGINT#, #storeId:BIGINT#, #userId:BIGINT#, #orderItemId:BIGINT#, #sEndUsername:VARCHAR#, #dOrderDate:TIMESTAMP#, #sOrderStatus:CHAR#, #sPaymentStatus:CHAR#, #fAmount:DECIMAL#, #fPaymentFee:DECIMAL#, #txnId:VARCHAR#, #payerId:VARCHAR#, #receiptId:VARCHAR#, #sPayerStatus:VARCHAR#, #dPaymentDate:TIMESTAMP#, #sPaymentRemarks:VARCHAR#, #sAppName:VARCHAR#, #sAppTerritories:VARCHAR#, #sAppIconImage:VARCHAR#, #sAppLoaderImage:VARCHAR#, #bAppSubmissionToApple:BIT#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

app_id

)
values

sqlMap.update:
update orders
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
app_id = #record.appId:BIGINT#
store_id = #record.storeId:BIGINT#
user_id = #record.userId:BIGINT#
order_item_id = #record.orderItemId:BIGINT#
s_end_username = #record.sEndUsername:VARCHAR#
d_order_date = #record.dOrderDate:TIMESTAMP#

s_payment_status = #record.sPaymentStatus:CHAR#
f_amount = #record.fAmount:DECIMAL#
f_payment_fee = #record.fPaymentFee:DECIMAL#
txn_id = #record.txnId:VARCHAR#
payer_id = #record.payerId:VARCHAR#
receipt_id = #record.receiptId:VARCHAR#

s_app_icon_image = #record.sAppIconImage:VARCHAR#
s_app_loader_image = #record.sAppLoaderImage:VARCHAR#

app_id = #appId:BIGINT#

user_id = #userId:BIGINT#
order_item_id = #orderItemId:BIGINT#
s_end_username = #sEndUsername:VARCHAR#
d_order_date = #dOrderDate:TIMESTAMP#

s_payment_status = #sPaymentStatus:CHAR#
f_amount = #fAmount:DECIMAL#
f_payment_fee = #fPaymentFee:DECIMAL#

payer_id = #payerId:VARCHAR#
receipt_id = #receiptId:VARCHAR#

where id = #id:BIGINT#
